name: Battle Fleet Lite
description:
"Challenging and exciting" - AppAdvice.com
"Dreadfleet meets Axis & Allies" - BoardGameGeek.com
"If you want to get a whiff of the experience of commanding a fleet in the Pacific in a naval battle, this is your game." - iPhone Life Magazine

BATTLE FLEET is the ultimate WW2 naval strategy game. You are in command of a fleet of US or Japanese ships in the Pacific theater of war during World War 2.

As AppAdvice says "this ain't your grandma's game of Battleship!"

The game features innovative turn based gameplay, allowing you to move your fleet into position, aim individual turrets on each ship and sink the enemy fleet.

Features:
Online Multiplayer - Play against another Human opponent online via Game Center.

US Campaign - Play through the first mission as the Captain of the USS Knight. Full Version features the rest of the campaign.

Control Frigates and Cruisers in the Lite Version, with Battleships, Aircraft Carriers and Destroyers in the Full Version.

Access Strategic Command support such as Airstrikes, Sabotage, and Naval Minefields.

Control the aim and power of each of your ship's guns.

Maneuver your ships to maximize their firepower with a full broadside attack.

(FULL VERSION) Single Player Battle Mode - Face off against an AI opponent.

(FULL VERSION) HotSeat Multiplayer - Play against another Human opponent on the same iPad

(FULL VERSION) Japanese Campaign - Take command for the Empire of Japan and experience the other side of the story.

(FULL VERSION) Hunt and Sink a powerful Battleship in the US Campaign.

(FULL VERSION) Launch waves of aircraft from your carriers.

(FULL VERSION) Arm your ships with Torpedoes, Spread Turrets and massive 14" High Explosive guns! 

Check out the full trailer and tutorial at:
